Name: LocoMotion
About the game: Locomotion is a Action, Platformer Game Inspired by many other Games out there. This game has a fascinating story behind it! Play it to find out what secrets the Acidic Waters have in store for you! You play as a crash test dummy, and the people who made you need to test your strength. Features Included In-Game Roll Sprint Jump Lock-on Mode Chapters & Levels Chapters Chapter 1 - Level 1-5 Chapter 2 - Level 5-10 Chapter 3 - Level 10-15 The End - Level 15 Levels Level 1 Level 2 Level 3 Level 4 Level 5 Level 6 Level 7 Level 8 Level 9 Level 10 Level 11 Level 12 Level 13 Level 14 Level 15 DO NOT REPLICATE ANY ACTIONS IN GAME, WE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY INJURIES, Thank you
